Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by San Francisco in 2017...
Injured on 8/29/2017 with a Inflamed Tricep Tendon, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 6/22/2018 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 8/12/2018...
Injured on 5/1/2019 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 7/29/2019 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove at Pitcher in 2019...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/2020, winning 2 games with a 1.13 ERA...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,234,286 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/22/2022 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
